main event: An unidentified object appearing as a light was observed through binoculars, estimated to be 2 to 3 times the size of a star, moving to the South at a height of 60 feet.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 90 seconds,The object was observed through binoculars,There was speculation that it might have been a daylight reflection or a balloon,The report is from Project Blue Book,The sighting includes a witness who claims knowledge of saucers and has seen electrical phenomena associated with UFOs.
witness description: The witness has extensive knowledge about saucers through research and knows many others who have seen similar objects.
